thread.title: David Bell
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by David Bell

author: David Bell
title: David Bell
text: Absolutely outstanding customer service. Within 24 hrs of order being submitted they contacted due to an issue - the issue being entirely my fault! They gave advice on how to resolve it and the product was delivered a couple of days later. The cushion itself was of excellent quality, Highly Recommended.
